Detailed Description

SmsClass0Provider is the provider to retrieve the class 0 sms from the nvram. An instance of this class is part of the Apoxi Data Control. A pointer to this provider can be retrieved from the main provider via the id:

c_sms_class0_provider_id

Please refer to SmsProvider for possible columns

NOTE: Please do not instantiate this class.
